The following snippet of text is rendered as bold text.

The following snippet of text is rendered as italicized text.

Modals

Note: When a modal window is opened, a CSS blur filter is applied to all DOM elements having the .modal-blur class and a CSS grayscale filter is applied to all DOM elements having the .modal-gray class.

Navbar

Mindsmash navbar

There is a special version of Bootstrap's navbar for mindsmash applications. It is based on flex-box and can be activated with the following classes and sub-elements:


        .msm-navbar {} /* Apply mindsmash style and colors to classic boostrap navbar */
        .msm-navbar-flex {} /* Applied to the direct sub-element of .navbar for flex-box element organization */

Title

    • Action
    • Another action
    • Something else here
    • Separated link

Default Boostrap navbar

For navbar use the default navbar classes from Bootstrap. These are additional classes for mindsmash-ui:


        .msm-navbar {} /* Apply mindsmash style and colors to navbar */
